column5: Was thinking of going for some perch etc. on simcoe (shore fishing), but I see it is expected to rain with chance of thunder tonight. Would I be wasting my time trying for them in the rain?
As long as you stay dry and comfortable, I see no reason why it would be worse with rain in the mix.  But perch are not night feeders so try to get that stuff done before nightfall.

I prefer fishing Barrie in the rain .. it keeps most people away and more room for me .. a good rain coat and warm dry boots and your good to go .. let me know how ya make out .. I want to go down on Thursday
Rain is good.  Thunder and lightning not good. I have this thing about holding a lightning rod in my hands out in the open.
I've always had a lot of luck perch fishing in Erie in the rain.
